title: Work - force vector acting through a distance

content.question: A block of mass <math alttext="m" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>m</mi></math>, initially at rest, experiences a position-dependent force given by the expression <math alttext="vector F equals, open parenthesis, 3 x, close parenthesis, i hat, plus, open parenthesis, negative 2 x squared, close parenthesis, j hat" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mover><mi>F</mi><mo>→</mo></mover><mo>=</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mover accent="true"><mi>i</mi><mo>^</mo></mover><mo>+</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mover accent="true"><mi>j</mi><mo>^</mo></mover></mstyle></math>, where <math alttext="x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>x</mi></math> is the position of the block. The block slides along a horizontal surface, as shown in the diagram, where friction between the block and the surface is negligible. Which expression correctly represents the kinetic energy of the block after it has undergone a horizontal displacement of magnitude <math alttext="D" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>D</mi></math>?

choices.label: <math alttext="K equals two thirds D cubed" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>K</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><msup><mi>D</mi><mn>3</mn></msup></math>
<math alttext="K equals three halves D squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>K</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><msup><mi>D</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math>

<math alttext="K equals three halves D squared, minus two thirds D cubed" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>K</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><msup><mi>D</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><msup><mi>D</mi><mn>3</mn></msup></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="K equals three halves D squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>K</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><msup><mi>D</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
